events.2025-01-01: China adjusts MFN tariff rates for 2025; US Section 301 tariffs imposed adjusted on selected Chinese products, including tungsten, wafers, and polysilicon
events.2025-01-20: Trump administration starts, Biden administration ends
events.2025-02-04: US tariffs of 10 percent imposed on all imports from China under International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA)
events.2025-02-07: US Section 201 tariffs reduced on solar panels in eighth year of policy
events.2025-02-10: China retaliates against US tariffs under IEEPA imposed February 4
events.2025-03-04: US tariffs of 10 percent on all imports from China under IEEPA; US tariffs imposed on imports from Canada and Mexico that are not compliant with USMCA [not shown]
events.2025-03-10: China retaliates against US tariffs under IEEPA imposed March 4
events.2025-03-12: US Section 232 tariffs imposed on steel, aluminum, and derivative products
events.2025-04-03: US Section 232 tariffs of 25 percent imposed on automobiles
events.2025-04-05: US tariffs of 10 percent imposed on nearly all countries, including China, under IEEPA, but with some sector carveouts
events.2025-04-09: US tariffs ranging from 1 percent to 74 percent imposed on nearly all countries with a trade surplus with the US, including China (74 percent), under IEEPA. US tariff on China includes an additional 50 percent tariff as counter-retaliation for China��s retaliation announcement
events.2025-04-10: China retaliates against US tariffs under IEEPA imposed April 5 and 9 by imposing tariffs of 84 percent; US eliminates tariffs imposed April 9 on trade surplus countries under IEEPA with exception of China, which faces an additional 41 percent tariff increase under IEEPA (to 125 percent total), but with some sector carveouts
events.2025-04-11: US removes some additional tariffs imposed under IEEPA on April 5, 9, and 10, carving out some additional products that contain semiconductors
events.2025-04-12: China retaliates against US tariffs under IEEPA imposed April 10, to reach levels of recent US tariff increases of 125 percent
events.2025-05-03: US Section 232 tariffs of 25 percent imposed on automobile parts
events.2025-05-14: US reduces to 10 percent from 125 percent the cumulative tariffs under IEEPA imposed on certain imports from China on April 5, 9 and 10; China reduces to 10 percent from 125 percent the cumulative retaliation to the IEEPA tariffs China had imposed on April 10 and 12
